messages.subject: Change the topic in the subject line (was re: Digest people)
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, In the group I own, we have this little reminder at the bottom.  Can t say it was my idea though I swiped it from some where... ... You would be able to
messages.messageBody:
Joyce,

In the group I own, we have this little reminder at the bottom. Can't
say it was my idea though I swiped it from some where...

>
>
> To unsubscribe send a blank email to:
> Oct2001moms-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
> ~~~ Don't forget! If you change the topic, change the subject line! ~~~
>

You would be able to add to the footer in the group settings page.

It might not help any but then again who knows maybe some people read
the footers... LOL


April
